alert.note: Alert for Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 02 at 9:29PM EDT until April 03 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Cass River At Frankenmuth affecting Saginaw County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cass River At Frankenmuth. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 6.5 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Impact...The river begins to overflow its banks in places. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
